title: Thrush in men and women
description: Thrush is a common yeast infection that affects men and women. It's usually harmless but it can be uncomfortable and keep coming back.  It isn't classed as a sexually transmitted infection (STI).

header.value: Thrush is a common yeast infection that affects men and women.  It's usually harmless but it can be uncomfortable and keep coming back.  It isn't classed as a sexually transmitted infection (STI).

options.title: See what thrush looks like on the vagina, penis and skin

value.caption: Thrush on the penis
value.alt: Penis with foreskin pulled back showing red and sore glans

value.caption: Thrush on the vagina
value.alt: Thick, white discharge around a reddened vagina, inside the labia

value.caption: Thrush on the skin
value.alt: A red, scaly rash in the shape of a circle with white discharge around the edge, on white skin
